text: The Liberal Democratic Party () is a liberal party in Angola, and is a member of Liberal International. In the 1992 elections, the PLD won 2.4% of the vote, gaining three seats in parliament. However, in the 2008 legislative election, the party gained only 0.33% of the vote and no seats in Parliament. The party's founder and leader is Anália de Victória Pereira. ==See also== *Liberalism *Contributions to liberal theory *Liberalism worldwide *List of liberal parties *Liberal democracy ==External links== *Liberal Democratic Party official website (down) Category:Liberal parties in Angola Category:Political parties in Angola Category:Political parties established in 1983 Category:1983 establishments in Angola
title: Liberal Democratic Party (Angola)
